Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: GAB
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for its price. For people like me who just need a camera for everyday things and not professional photography, this camera does very well. The pictures are crisp, clear, and very detailed. The iSCN is very useful since it automatically detects the type of scene and selects the most appropriate camera settings. The camera retouching tools are quite useful just in case you want to edit it a little right after the picture taking. I love the camera. It looks great and is very easy to use. Better than my last Polaroid model camera.

Reviews.Title: crystal clear pictures! great purchase
Reviews.Author: Jenelle
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing! I have had a sony camera before but I recently purchased this one because I broke my other one. This camera is inexpensive for what it does. The videos work well and the pictures come out crystal clear. The camera automatically adjusts its lens to what type of lighting your trying to capture the picture in. You can edit a photo right on the camera before even uploading it to your computer. The sleek matte look makes it look like an expensive camera. I'm a college student and it captures my friends as well as sites around the city

Reviews.Title: Ease of use - A.  Picture Quality - D.
Reviews.Author: liberryteacher "Holly"
Reviews.Content: I used this in a large electronics store and liked it - liked the buttons, menus, etc. Snapped a pic or two, looked fine.  So I bought it.Took it hiking the very next day.  Seemed to work well, though I did find it switching "scenes" annoying.  I can't tell you how disappointed I was with the pictures when I got home. Some are too dark - a lot of them.  On a bright sunny day.  Outdoors.  Some are either blurry up close and stuff in the back is clear, or vice versa.  I took several pictures of the beautiful sunlight gleaming on the river....and got white out all over the place.I'm taking this back, in hopes that the electronics store will let me exchange it.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Buckeye_Knight
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for our workplace.  It is quite thin for your pocket, yet is a 12 mega-pixel with 4x optical zoom.  I really like that this camera can use SD memory cards, as well as Memory Stick.  When I used it, it worked fine.  So I would recommend this camera.It also comes with the Sony PMB photo management software, which I have used with my Sony DSC-SX63 flash camcorder as well.  Nice for organizing photos and films.This is not a waterproof camera.  I would go for the Sony DSC-TX5 for that.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: JaLeesa B
Reviews.Content: This camera is alot smaller than it seems in the picture, which is a great thing. The color is also pretty. However, the few modes that are contained in this camera dont apply to the many situations and/or locations that the camera could adjust to. The pictures arent always clear and the pictures often come out dark whether theyre taken inside or outside. Im sorry to say that I wouldnt recommend this camera to others.

Reviews.Title: Poor Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: M. PUSEY "marie9999"
Reviews.Content: Kodak Z760 that we used at the plant died.  So my boss buy anything but a Kodak.  Great price on this Sony and with a name like Sony it has to be good - right?  Wrong.  Great price but the photos are poor and when placed side by side against the 6.1MP Kodak Z760 photos in powerpoint presentations there is no question that this is a terrible camera.  I spent hours reviewing documentation and making adjustments just to finally give up and in that this camera's photo quality isn't up to par.

Reviews.Title: An honest assessment...for a change.
Reviews.Author: James David Reyome
Reviews.Content: I have read a lot of negative reviews of this camera here. Having used my own for nine months, my conclusion is that some folks could take a picture with a pinhole camera and get results like Ansel Adams, and then others might possess all the high dollar gear in the world and still get pictures of their fingers, and out of focus pictures at that. Like most folks reading this, I probably fall somewhere in the middle of that grouping.So. This camera is the digital equivalent of an Instamatic, which is to say, you point and you shoot. It has a 4x optical zoom that works quite well, it has a nice bright display which accurately portrays what you will get on your finished shot, and it has lots of options you may or may not find useful; fact is, most of us will do little with it other than take what we used to call "snapshots". To each his own. But if you take the time to work at it, you can get some mighty fine snapshots with this piece. This is our family's third Cyber-Shot and I've found it's a worthy successor to its predecessors.

Reviews.Title: Reliable photographic companion
Reviews.Author: Incognito
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent entry level, everyday point-and shoot camera. Since the camera is no longer the latest model, it can now be had with a discount.  It may annoy professional photographers or nit-picky hobbyists, however. Camera is well built, extremely compact and very affordable.  The camera's computer will automatically determine the optimal settings for photos. It has image stabilization and smile detection to help capture special moments. Pictures are crisp, colorful, and can be easily reviewed on the camera's wide 2.7 inch LCD screen in gallery or slide-show modes.  Photos can be edited and retouched within the camera itself, so you can go straight to the photo store without going near a computer.If you prefer more manual control and tinkering, this may not be the camera for you, as it is designed to do most of the work, although you can change some of the automatic settings. Its ease of use is very appealing, leaving me to concentrate on the subject matter, rather than technical issues. Sleek, compact body, auto retracting wide angle lens, 4x optical zoom, image stabilization, intuitive controls, built-in utilities, adaptability, user friendliness and intelligent computer make this a great everyday photographic companion.

Reviews.Title: In an technological age, you'd expect better
Reviews.Author: J. Harriman "firefly07"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, if your surroundings are great. However, if you happen to be outside where it is bright, or inside where it is dim, or any situation where there is movement, your pictures will come out blurry, yellow, too dark, or with odd shadows. Essentially, you can expect the same picture quality from one of those old-school disposable cameras.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality worse than even 7 mega pixel camera
Reviews.Author: Satyadhir Singh "u235 Maverick"
Reviews.Content: This is one of the worse sony product I believe. I bought this camera due to its low price as I wanted something for very casual outings. My friend had a Kodak 8 mega pixel camera. This being 12.1 couldn't even match half of 8 MP camera. Kodak was even cheaper than this but picture was good. Specifically the night shots were really worse. Even in day light the pictures were not showing up clearly. Returning this camera after 4 days. I had a Canon Powershot SD series 7 mega pixel camera earlier and I am going back to SD series now. Will never suggest this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE!!! I'm disappointed!
Reviews.Author: BouclesBrunes
Reviews.Content: I used to have a Sony Cybershot DSCN1, THE BEST CAMERA EVER and after 5 years, I decided to change because the pictures were more and more blurred.After long research, I bought the DSC-W310 hoping I would get the same quality pictures (maybe not exactly the same because of the difference of prices, but quality nonetheless).Unfortunately, I have had this camera for 6 months now, and I have discovered new problems pretty much EVERY DAY:- the camera is VERY LONG to shoot ! Sometimes, 3 or 4 seconds after I pushed the button.- pictures look great on the small screen and then appear blurred on my computer.- pictures at night are REALLY bad. Most of the time, I do not see anything.The only good thing is the quality of the videos.To sum up: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA, except if you take really basic photos.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: David T.
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mother who's not camera nor technology savvy. No need for a lot of features. The price point, the name brand, and the large display were the main reasons for the purchase.  The Easy Mode is especially fitting for her.  I must say, however, that I was totally disappointed with this camera after a mere few hours of experimentation.  At first I was impressed.  Compared with my other cameras (all Canon), the user interface is really well designed and easy to use.  I especially like the one-button toggle between the camera and the playback mode.  The pictures seems great on the camera display.  However, there lies the showstopper.  Once the pictures are loaded to the PC and shown on the PC monitor, they are noticeably sub-par to any point and shoot digital cameras I have ever known.  All of the pictures came across as "seemingly aged", as if coming from a Polaroid or a scanner. The photos are blurry and grainy as if taken using a high ISO setting. I tried all kinds of combination of settings but did not make any difference.  The subject's eye brow hair is not distinguishable with this camera, while I can see the individual hair with my other camera (specifically Canon Powershot SD800).  What's the point of having 12.1 mega pixel when it cannot take clear pictures?!  Sorry, I would not recommend this camera, even with the low price.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: G. Williams
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy and it really works well.  It is very easy to use and takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: Decent.
Reviews.Author: Austin
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in the summer of 2010 as a birthday present for myself and it worked perfectly fine for about 6 months, then the BLUR monster must have attacked its insides. It takes blurry pictures most of the time now and the steady shot features does NOT work properly at all, neither does the automatic take when smiling feature. It's just decent overall.

Reviews.Title: A photographer needs a camera...
Reviews.Author: ERP
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little simple digital camera with a 4 x zoom. I needed a small camera to carry in my purse or pocket. I do a lot of nature photography and also take photos of church activities. My other Sony - much more sophisticated and with a 15X zoom - is a bit cumbersome to carry around. So far this new one has worked out well.My tip to amateur photographers is always have a camera at hand. You never know when a photo op will present itself.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: Matt Hogan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift, and one of the criteria was that it had to be pink.  This fit the bill.  Ive always liked Sony products, and this one doesnt disappoint.  The image quality is good, has a lot of features, and the battery life is good.  I do recommend getting a second battery to have as a spare.  My only complaint with this camera is that it has no option to take black and white photos.  Before people say 'just make it black and white on your computer!'... I shouldnt have to.  I had a Sony a couple of models below this one that took great black and white pictures, every cell phone Ive had with a camera has a black and white option, but its absent from this model.  Its not a huge deal, but its frustrating when you want that feature.  Overall, I like this camera, but its four stars since it lacks a black and white feature.

Reviews.Title: quick shipment, slow shutter speed
Reviews.Author: David E. Papoi
Reviews.Content: Amazon did a fine job with prompt shipment.  The camera performs very well and creates high quality pictures.  Our only issue is that the long response time between clicking the button and the picture being taken.  I am sure there is a technical term for this, but I don't know it.  On balance, this is a good camera for the low price.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy for the price!
Reviews.Author: S. S. Shah
Reviews.Content: This is a great digital camera for the price. It is a very easy to use, nice looking, small camera and has a very good picture quality, as good as you can get without Carl Zeiss Lens.  Also, it supports both Memory Stick and SD cards.  For people who just need a camera for everyday use and not professional quality, this camera is perfect.

Reviews.Title: It's great for the price
Reviews.Author: Manny
Reviews.Content: It's a very easy to use camera and takes very good pictures;I can take wide angle pictures from close range and don't leave anybody outspecially when you have a large family. I'm satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great Entry Level Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Johnny Pasta "Johnny Pasta"
Reviews.Content: I see a lot of people here bad mouthing this camera. What a bunch of morons. If they would read the manual for a half a second this is not that hard of a camera to operate. In fact one of the simplest I have found to operate. It's all about how you program and set it up. This camera is a no brainer. For the morons out there just set it up for all automatic everything. Than you should have no problem but to point and shoot. You'll be amazed at the pictures you take after that. It's all elementary my dear Watson.

Reviews.Title: Not that bad.
Reviews.Author: MDW
Reviews.Content: Camera works great for daytime pictures. During dusk or dark situations it is not the best. Overall I like the long life of the lithium battery and the compact size.

Reviews.Title: exelent!!!
Reviews.Author: francisco
Reviews.Content: veryy good camera, the only complaint is that it doesn't comes with the sd card but is not so much expensive.the images are great and the video quality is incredible.I really recoment this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: KIRK RANSON
Reviews.Content: Color was great for a girl.Small size to take anywhere.Easy to use and the price was rightUses standard SD cards that can be read on most any PC

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: drumflight
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the money. Takes good photos and has a nice long battery life. The auto macro close up feature is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Cyber Shot
Reviews.Author: williamdot
Reviews.Content: Even though they make smart phones with "ok" cameras and video capabilities...There's nothing like a good mini camera.  The only downfall is don't forget to purchase a SD chip...........there is no internal memory

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Tami Ayres
Reviews.Content: I use this camera for work. It is small enough to fit in my pocket, easy to use and has a wide angle zoom perfect for small areas showing the most of a room or area.

Reviews.Title: It's my favorite camera!
Reviews.Author: LB
Reviews.Content: Macro, light balance, zoom features, movies . . . This camera does everything and is so easy to use. I just love it. I just bought a new Panasonic Lumix so I could baby this one, because I love the features and the quality of the images so much.

Reviews.Title: Grainy picture, unusable, SONY does not stand behind their products
Reviews.Author: Kelly C Garner
Reviews.Content: My husband purchased this camera for me, with a warranty from sears. It worked properly for about 6 months before it started showing all pictures with grainy lines. I brought it back to the warranty center four times, Sony refuses to replace unless you return it five times (they just send out the broken one to be "fixed"). Each time it was returned to me, it worked for a few hours and then had the exact same issue again. I called Sony directly because my warranty with Sears is now up. Sony will either fix the camera for $107 - almost the price of a new camera - or, will give me 15% off the purchase of a new product.  It is completely unusable and I am stuck with this broken product.  I will never purchase another Sony camera.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Nava_Sensei
Reviews.Content: very good item, like all Sony products, the quality of the materials give a you a mark of resistence and durability

Reviews.Title: fine
Reviews.Author: Joare Hidalgo
Reviews.Content: good, perfect, i love this because it is so nice, is very conford and this product i recomend in every moment

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 3 year old daughter and it's perfect.  It's easy for her to use.  It's a real camera that takes pretty good photos.  I have not printed the photos yet but they look good on the screen.  :)

Reviews.Title: One of two cameras purchased is not working properly and has a dark spot on the viewing screen.
Reviews.Author: Dalores Paar
Reviews.Content: It is not the camera itself that I dislike.  I feel that I was sent a re-furbished (used) camera instead of a new one and it is not working properly.  In addition, this is the 3rd of the same camera and the two new purchases were boxed differently.  One came with a USB data cable and the other had a USB card reader that does not work with out an adapter that I do not  have.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: César Alcázar
Reviews.Content: Recomiendo 100% al vendedor. El producto me llegó en perfectas condiciones y en el tiempo que lo necesitaba. Realmente era lo que esperaba y mucho mas. Espero seguir comprando a éste proveedor en muchas ocasiones mas

Reviews.Title: no problems
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: no problems with camera.  I send it our with my guys on a daily basis to take pictures and they all can use it with ease

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: the varner family "Mom of 2"
Reviews.Content: 9 yr old daughter loves it!! Seems to take good pics and its not to hard for her to work and use.  Got here fast and in great condiction! VEry happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Camera with defect
Reviews.Author: Julibeth
Reviews.Content: good afternoon I am writing to notify you that the camera has had problems since qu competition will not read any type memory and therefore I can not use it because I can not store photos really what interests me is that I change the camera but not reimburse me the money

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Walter Monserratte "WALTERMON"
Reviews.Content: very fast arrival soon I give 5 stars'll buy other again, they are very professional, pleasant delivers recommend anyone requiring purchase many thanks

Reviews.Title: Not the best Sony product i've owned.
Reviews.Author: C. Wilson "game maniac"
Reviews.Content: I sold my 7.0 megapixel Sony to buy this one and I must say , I really miss my 7.0 megapixel.  To me the pictures were brighter on my previous one although though this is not a bad camera, I just expected a little more out of it than it's giving. Pictures came out more blurry so had to take a lot of retakes. Still overall I think this is an okay camera, it does have a lot more modern touches than the previous ones.

Reviews.Title: just ok
Reviews.Author: Mary Schnoor "ducky"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a new camera cause my old one is a finepix and very old.  Only a 2 mp and a 3x zoom...I wanted better so I did a lot of reserch and found this one.  The main reason I didn't like my old one was because the shutter speed was slow and that camera is about at least 20 or more years old.  This sony cyber-shot is slower then my old one.  Now how can that be, I go to snap the picture and it takes at least 5 seconds before it accually takes the picture.  Well by that time you lost what you were going to take.  I am dissapointed and I just might take it back (if I can).  Oh and the quality of the picture is no different then my very old camera.

Reviews.Title: old DSC W7 was nicer to use
Reviews.Author: Les Saisons de Ma Vie "mariacc"
Reviews.Content: cute little camera... easy to use...picture quality is great, when you have the patience to adjust the settingsbattery life is horrible...shopping for an extra battery.

Reviews.Title: Sony w310 best
Reviews.Author: jugnu
Reviews.Content: I bought this camara and one memory card after using my canon. this is very easy to use and take very good images as compair to my canon which twice as costly as this. I bought 5 more camara after buying this to gift all my relatives.

Reviews.Title: user friendly
Reviews.Author: savoy brown
Reviews.Content: The functions of this camera are basic, and easy to use.The quality is that of a more expensive camera.

Reviews.Title: Best camera for Price
Reviews.Author: N. ALANIA "Natali"
Reviews.Content: I was slightly nervous buying this Sony camera because of the low price and some bad review. But now I can say that I like it very much. The camera is pocket size, light and has very simple menu. It's very easy to use and u can take very good quality pics.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Laurie A. Weber
Reviews.Content: takes nice pictures  not a lot of zoom but does take pretty good shots  very easy to use and steady shot image stabilization is nice.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-W310
Reviews.Author: reb
Reviews.Content: The camera is great my daughter loves it, esp. the pink color.  We did think it was going to be thinner than the atual camera- because the advertisement showed the camera being placed in back pockets of jeans. FYI- I would not recommend this because of the LCD screen. The only disappointment was that it did not come with a memory card.  Even one with a minute amount of memory would have been better than none at all; luckily she we had one that fit from another source.

Reviews.Title: Digital camera
Reviews.Author: Clement Chiwaula
Reviews.Content: Great piece of an item and great services the way business should be handled I recomend to any one!! The price is definetily fair for the item.

Reviews.Title: Do not believe everything you read!
Reviews.Author: Westlondoner "westlondoner"
Reviews.Content: I have had Sony cyber-shot cameras before. I have had this one for over a month. It is the best yet. When I bought my first cyber-shot, I was horrified at the quality of the pictures. Then I opened them in Photoshop and touched Auto Levels and...glory! The pictures are glorious.

Reviews.Title: Loved this Camera
Reviews.Author: Bama_Girl
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a year. i Love it. love the color, and the size. i would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice cam.!
Reviews.Author: Yessi2011
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! I love it because it takes really nice pictures!! And nice videos too!:) I got it on pink and is a pretty color:)

Reviews.Title: Best Camera I've Owned
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Best camera I've owned.. Hands down. Has a built in speaker so you can playback your recorded videos. The camera images are good for a 12 mp.. Best camera for the price

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: DollyGirl355
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. I loved the color, so I ordered it. I love it, and it was at a great price.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: jkt
Reviews.Content: Love Sony cybershot camera. Bought one for me then got another for my daughter. Easy to use, takes great pics and very compact. If you are looking for a basic digital camera with high quality at a great price this is the one to buy.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: bakari
Reviews.Content: may be not the best buit definitely good for its price. bought it for my friend as a christmas gift and she is happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Clewis
Reviews.Content: My wife was looking for a small digital camera that she could keep in her purse and the Sony DSC310 is perfect.  We had previously seen this little camera on sale at Sam's Club.  When we went back to buy it, it was no longer on sale.  We asked if they would honor the sale price, even though it was just a day or two past the sale date, and they would not.  Went to Amazon.com and not only did we find it for the sale price that Sam's had offered, but got it with no sales tax and free shipping.  She has been very happy with the quality of the pictures she has taken so far.

Reviews.Title: Worse than my 3-4 years old 7.2 mp Cybershot
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: I was going to give this to my best friend as a birthday gift but not anymore.  I wanted to make sure I gave her a decent camera that works at least as good as mine so I took a sample picture in my room.  I looked at the picture from the LCD screen and was surprised at the graininess and blurriness of the picture when I zoomed in.  I decided to take a look on my computer hoping I was wrong but I wasn't.  The quality is awful.  I took many pictures with different settings, with and without flash, and close-up and far away pictures.  None of them looked great... well, except for a close-up picture with the iSCN setting on.  But that was all.  You might say it's the lighting in my room but I took the same pictures with my old 7.2MP cybershot and there were no blurriness or graininess.The only thing that is good about this model is that it can capture a lot of light so you don't need flash as much.It's fortunate that I tried this camera before giving it to my friend.  She's definitely not getting this, I'm returning it tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: The camera has screen freeze problem, but the company still charged me 15% restocking fee
Reviews.Author: Jinmei He
Reviews.Content: This camera drove me crazy with the screen freeze problem over and over again,so I had to return it just 3 day after I got them, I even wrote a letter to the company to explainthe camera has this unbelievable problem, because the guy on the phone told me if the camera has problem,they won't charge restocking fee, but they still charged me $15, I guess no matterwhat reason you return, they would charge 15% anyway.Just stay away from this company, DataVision Computer Video. I went to Bestbuy and boughtan Olympus waterproof camera without any risk to be charged restocking fee and I can returnit in 14 days, also they matched the online price(only on bestbuy.com). Good service made a difference.By the way, I've been using Sony sybershot for many years, but this DSC-W310 is very cheap made,the back of the camera is all plastic, very cheap, and this screen freeze problem is a big headache,my old sybershot only has 7.2 MP but it is much much better and the picture is much clearer than this one.I am so disappionted that I had to switch to a different brand.

Reviews.Title: One GOTCHA! after another.  Paying for the Name
Reviews.Author: JASON CASTEEL
Reviews.Content: This might be ok for a little kid, but even when taken out of "Simple Mode" it lacks the features and quality of a lower priced Panasonic or Polaroid.  Mostly things you wouldn't think to spec out before you bought.  Its almost like a bad joke, every time you want to do something really basic it's like somebody yells "GOTCHA!" It doesn't do that either....  I have had it about a week, and I have had it with this camera.  Specifics:  Only 8 scene modes, and only a couple are the standard useful ones.  They actually pad the number of scene modes with one that is only good when looking at blue water from a beach.  Another is only good for making food on a plate look better  (No, REALLY!)  As near as I can tell, the Macro mode only kicks on when it wants to, you can not set white balance like every $80 camera out there so your colors come out looking ridiculous, especially in "Easy Mode" The level of dithering in the picture makes anything you take horribly blurry when blown up just the slightest.  The batteries are not standard, and stupidly expensive ($30 to $50 each), as well as not carried widely.  The focal settings are so terrible that you have to zoom in all the way and still not be able to see something like you would see it when you look with your eyes, so you really can't count that as a zoom.  The scan rate is so slow that you get bars of light and dark when trying to photograph a computer monitor or LCD Screen such as a Cell Phone or Blackberry.  When compensating for this, the image becomes so dark and blurry as to look like a 110 camera. Then there is the pause between shots.  It just goes black in some modes for several seconds after each shot, much like an older cell-phone camera.  This was an unopened, sealed, undamaged box, with full packaging, and instructions. This review is of a camera in newly manufactured condition.  They are all like this.I would actually have to recommend Polaroid over this.  This would have been my 6th pocket digital camera, but I will have to try something else before I throw this thing against the wall in frustration.  The characteristics would have been ok for around $25-$30, like something made of plastic that you would get for a little kid, or get out of a "crane-game", or maybe a web-cam, but not for soemthing sold as a camera at this price point.  Sony used to be pretty good, but aparently they have fallen from grace.

Reviews.Title: excelent product
Reviews.Author: codk
Reviews.Content: it was for a gift, and i have no complaions about the camera, so far so god. i recomended, aldo there are a large variaty of cameras roight now with more MP and more zoom. this camera for common users are fine.

Reviews.Title: such a disappointment
Reviews.Author: Lisa Huntting Dunn
Reviews.Content: I wanted a smaller camera to take to a family wedding and that would have a good display in sunlight. Little did I know that you can't see a thing on the display after the sun goes down or in a dimly-lit room...like where the reception was. The zoom is so fast it is hard to fix on the shot you want. There are way too many menu adjustments. Worst of all, pictures I and others took were pretty awful.I will be taking this back.Why oh why can't manufacturers make a camera with a viewfinder? Then you can actually SEE what you're getting.Will I choose another small camera? no. I will stick with my 5-year old, 5 pixel camera with a viewfinder.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Natali "Nad"
Reviews.Content: Highly recommended! Good camera... take clear photos. The color pink is gorgeous. Very good choice! Love it!

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Mikey
Reviews.Content: Pros:* Effective 12.1 MP is great* Everything a point & shoot should doCons:* Main gripe = If you take a portrait picture, when you play/preview it back, the camera does not automatically rotate the picture.  The last Sony digi-cam I had (W220, discontinued & a step below), rotated pictures automatically. With this camera, with a portrait pic, you have to press Menu, scroll down to 5 buttons to find the rotate function & manually do it yourself.* Lens is not Carl Zeiss.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Image Quality
Reviews.Author: Finch
Reviews.Content: I got this for my girlfriend. She was very excited when she saw it. The color is very nice looking and the brushed metal looks very classy. All in all worth a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: Crappy Camera with Halos and Lines galore!!!
Reviews.Author: Seattle Original "Who misses original Seattle"
Reviews.Content: This crappy camera arrived broken.  Every picture has a wad of lines and halos, which no amount of cleaning and reading the manual will fix.  What a rip off!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
28mm equivalent Sony lens with 4x optical zoom
12.1-megapixel CCD sensor and 2.7-inch LCD screen (230k pixels)
SteadyShot image stabilization helps prevent blur
iAuto mode automatically optimizes camera settings; Smile Shutter technology automatically captures a smile
Card slot for optional Memory Stick Duo media and SD media
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-W310 12.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Zoom with Digital Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 2.7 inch LCD (Black)
